body.ab: Your letter of the 3d instant has been received.

In accordance with your recommendation, and that of the present District Attorney, I have increased the salary of the first Assistant District Attorney, Mr. Sicard, to twenty five hundred dollars per annum.
body.note: To Hon Wm Whiting—April 4, 1871—see p. 726, seq.
